course.title: CSI 2372 Advanced Programming Concepts With C++ (3 units)
course.desc: Differences between C++ and Java programming. C++ data types. Pointers and memory management. Object oriented programming in C++. File and stream I/O. Pre-processor macros. Templates and the Standard Template Library. Numerical computation in C++. Interfacing with hardware. Engineering applications.Course Component: Laboratory, Lecture, TutorialPrerequisites: ITI 1121, ITI 1100.
